field.name: summary
field.value: ViewComponent TestSupport does not work as expected

field.name: description
field.value:
When testing the rendering of Views via the BaseViewComponentTest in Monorail.TestSupport, the ViewEngineStub provided by the base class does not override the HasTemplate method.
Hence, when RenderView is called on the ViewComponent under test, the HasTemplate on ViewEngineBase is executed which actually tries to find a view template on the file system. This always fails in a test environment.
Updated ViewEngineStub to override that method and always return true.
